Class MedicineController

java.lang.Object
controller.MedicineController
public class MedicineController extends Object
The MedicineController class manages the inventory of medicines in the hospital management system. It provides functionalities to load medicines from a file, view inventory, add, delete, update stock, submit replenishment requests, and manage replenishment requests.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private final String
    medicineFilePath
    The file path for the medicine inventory CSV file.
    private Map<String,Medicine>
    medicineMap
    A map that stores medicines, keyed by medicine name.

      private void saveReplenishmentRequest(String medicineName, int quantityRequested, String status)
      Saves a replenishment request to the replenish request file.
      Parameters:
      medicineName - The name of the medicine being requested for replenishment.
      quantityRequested - The quantity requested for replenishment.
      status - The status of the replenishment request.

      private void updateReplenishmentRequestStatus(String medicineName, String newStatus)
      Updates the status of a replenishment request in the request file.
      Parameters:
      medicineName - The name of the medicine associated with the request.
      newStatus - The new status to set for the request.
